author: Shalini Ramachandran, Khadeeja Safdar, Kevin Hagen for The Wall Street Journal
title: What the Nurses See...
description: What the Nurses See... (Top headline, 11th story, link ) Related stories: Captain of aircraft carrier with growing outbreak pleads for help... U.S. emergency medical stockpile nearly out of protective gear... Pence task force freezes coronavirus aid amid back…
content:
Christina Norstein was hoarse, her nose swollen by mask marks. She wasnt sleeping much, and woke up crying one morning after a day at work. I feel like were being sent to slaughter, she said.
Ms. Norstein is an intensive-care nurse at Montefiore Medical Cent… [+91 chars]
